function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contaminated water supply leading to disease outbreak","Impact":"Spread of disease and potential fatalities","Mitigation":"Repair and maintain water infrastructure, provide alternative sources of clean water","Technologies":"Water filtration and purification systems","People":"Residents consuming the contaminated water","Owner":"Local authorities, water management organizations"},{"Description":"Poor sanitation and sewage management leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improving sewage systems, implementing proper waste management practices","Technologies":"Modern sewage systems, waste treatment facilities","People":"Residents in affected neighborhoods","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate sunlight and ventilation in buildings contributing to the spread of tuberculosis","Impact":"Increased risk of tuberculosis transmission and impact on public health","Mitigation":"Design and construct buildings with adequate sunlight and ventilation, utilize architectural features such as balconies and terraces","Technologies":"Architectural design principles for natural light and ventilation","People":"Building occupants, especially those at higher risk for tuberculosis","Owner":"Architects, building developers"}]}
